mapper.select: select * from note_info where user_id=#{userId} limit #{page},#{size}
select count(*) from note_info where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into note_info(note_title, note_description, note_context, category_id, user_id) values (#{noteTitle},#{noteDescription},#{noteContext},#{categoryId},#{userId})
mapper.select: select * from note_info where category_id=#{categoryId} and user_id=#{userId}
select * from note_info where update_time >= #{startTime} and update_time <= #{endTime}
select * from note_info where user_id=#{userId} and note_title like CONCAT('%',#{noteTitle},'%')
mapper.update: update note_info set note_status=1 where note_id=#{noteId}
update note_info set note_status=0 where note_id=#{noteId}
mapper.select: select * from note_info where note_status=1 limit #{page},#{size}
select count(*) from note_info where note_status=1
select * from note_info where note_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
